DOC.brief_summary: We investigated a correlation between maternal anxiety and age, body mass index (BMI), parity-gravidity, patient satisfaction, antenatal care, postoperative pain according to emergent or elective C/S under general anesthesia.
DOC.brief_title: Stress During Elective or Emergency Cesarean Operations
DOC.criteria: pregnant women aged ≥18 years (gestational age: 3740 weeks) underwent emergent or elective C/S. patients with cardiopulmonary, renal, hepatic or psychiatric disease, obstetricfetal anomaly and weighing ≥ 100 kg were excluded.
